Bachelor Of Fine Arts In Interior Design
Designing the future
Research Innovation: trend forecasting, critical thinking

1200 With the Miami campus initiated in 2018 and located in the Design District, studying a Bachelor’s of Fine Arts fashion degree at Istituto Marangoni Miami grants students the chance to succeed in the most in-demand fashion careers. Even in the United States, Istituto Marangoni Miami maintains its European foundation by teaching the Italian way of design and fashion but with a twist of the Miami style. IMM students are encouraged to complete their associate degree to then move on to their bachelor’s degree, and have the opportunity for acceptance into a Marangoni master’s program if desired. Once participants complete their degree, they transition into the Istituto Marangoni alumni group alongside major fashion names like Franco Moschino, Domenico Dolce, and Alessandro Sartori.

The fashion institute supports its students with a close-knit community, high quality fashion technology, immersive classrooms stocked with materials, and a network of talented and accomplished peers, alumni, and faculty for guidance through the educational journey at Marangoni Miami and into the world of fashion and luxury brands. (this is the description of our current site that we can put for the design but it will be changed)

request info
Your Academic Journey

Our Academic Programs offer a unique and dynamic learning experience that extends far beyond the conventional. Our programs provide a direct connection to the industry, enabling students to collaborate with professionals, work on practical projects, and gain insights from professors who are industry experts themselves. Students develop deep critical thinking skills, master meticulous industry research, and learn to prototype innovative solutions.

Perhaps most importantly, students become integral parts of our ever-evolving community. This vibrant network of individuals shares their passion and ambition, creating a supportive environment that fosters personal and professional growth. At Istituto Marangoni Miami, our Academic Programs empower students to not only excel in their chosen fields but also contribute to their evolution. It's more than an education; it's an immersive experience that forever shapes their approach to the fashion and design industry.

All programs
Undergraduate Program in Fashion Design

650 The fashion business courses at Marangoni Miami teach participants the importance of the various business types and the methods they may run based on different practices, managements, or marketing strategies. The goal is to understand the role of ‘business’ within the wider global image of the fashion industry.

Associate Degree In Fashion Business Price
lern more
Programs Total Semester Credit Hours Tuition per Credit Hour Non-Refundable Application Semester Campus Fees Semester Digital Resource Fees Total Cost of Attendance
Associate Degrees 60 $1,295 $100 $250 $350 $80,600
Bachelor Degrees 120 $1,295 $100 $250 $350 $160,700

* See Academic Calendar for dates. Initial registration for fashion studies after the end of the Drop/Add period will incur a $100 late registration fee.

The other registration fees are due on or before the last day to register for any given semester. Students should consult the Academic Calendar regarding the registration deadline. Students will not be officially enrolled in Istituto Marangoni Miami until all fees are fully paid. Any students owing money to Istituto Marangoni Miami, regardless of the debt, will not be permitted to register

FAQ
What is a bachelor’s degree in fashion?

A Bachelor’s Degree in fashion or a Bachelor’s in Fine Arts degree from Istituto Marangoni Miami is a 4-year program established to implement all of the teachings needed in the fashion industry in order for students to succeed once they graduate and are in the real-world of fashion. IMM offers various branches in the fashion bachelor’s degree to choose from based on the applicant's interests and aspirations. A BFA in Fashion Design teaches students the knowledge and skills needed for designing clothing and accessories – pattern cutting, garment technology, etc. all while developing the student’s personal style.

A BFA in Fashion Styling introduces concepts in visual communication, trend forecasting, and the analysis of style and brands to apply to ever changing technologies in the industry. A BFA in Fashion Business highlights the different methods and business types that are part of the global fashion industry through the aspects of management, marketing, and practices.

The Miami School of Fashion & Design

Istituto Marangoni Miami’s vision is to always be at the center of style, to drive students’ ambitions and dreams through creativity and innovation, to support creative industries worldwide, and to provide a solid and cross-disciplinary approach to education, research and business solutions in the world of Fashion and Design.

Name of Program
A collection for lovers of Domino style

IMM Fashion Design students had the opportunity to participate in a contest with Salvatore Ferragamo. The brand donated 500 ties that remained unsold during the challenging times of the pandemic. Our talented students embarked on a journey of innovation, repurposing the ties to craft stunning creations, from elegant dresses to trendy bucket hats and even fashionable umbrellas. The winner of the challenge had the opportunity to have their design showcased in the Salvatore Ferragamo Bal Harbour store.
